HomeHero.title: Ana
HomeHero.subtitle: finds insights you cannot
HomeHero.description: Deploy agents across all of your databases & systems of record.
HomeHero.carouselText: Ana finds insights in your existing data stack

JoinsSection.header: How Do We Find Insights Others Can't?
JoinsSection.description: Our agents can connect 100x more data sources than any other solution, finding insights across all your systems - regardless of how many databases your data lives in.

features.title: Intelligent Agent Architecture
features.description: Our agent understands complex data relationships and can automatically determine optimal join paths across hundreds of tables.

features.title: Comprehensive Data Ontology
features.description: A sophisticated semantic layer maps relationships between tables, enabling deterministic joins at scale.

features.title: Massive Compute Power
features.description: Our infrastructure handles complex join operations efficiently, processing hundreds of tables without performance degradation.

JoinsChart.title: Maximum Number of Tables AI Can Join Together
JoinsChart.yAxisLabel: Number of Table Sources They Can Connect
JoinsChart.footnote: *This excludes other data agent products that don't come with any out of the box advertised joining capabilities

EnterpriseSection.title: Secure & On Your Own Cloud
EnterpriseSection.description: Deploy TextQL in your infrastructure with enterprise-grade security and complete data sovereignty

features.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
features.description: SOC 2 Type II certified with end-to-end encryption

features.title: Data Sovereignty
features.description: Deploy in your own cloud with complete control

features.title: Cloud Agnostic
features.description: AWS, Azure, or GCP deployment options

OntologySection.title: Powered by The Ontology
OntologySection.description: Learn about the framework that lets TextQL join 100x more data together than other products

WorkflowCarousel.title: Discover How Ana Transforms Industries
WorkflowCarousel.description: Explore our library of AI-powered workflows that Ana is using to help enterprises unlock insights and drive value today.
